Comment: Supply and demand determine prices/economic impact. Globally coal is seen for what it is, power of last resort. I’d venture to say the slowly dying industry, continues its slow death.   Metallurgical coal is a different story, but purity must be high and volume required by steel industry isn’t exactly huge.
Author: ShoemakerMicah
